title: Software Developer Intern
desc:
Worked as a full-stack TypeScript developer on Bake’s production web application, building and maintaining user-facing features across the frontend and backend.
Contributed to API development and ad-hoc backend tasks, and owned enhancements to the company’s internal HR portal, improving workflow automation and usability for staff.

title: Teaching Assistant
desc:
As a Teaching Assistant, I provided academic support to junior students across a range of subjects, focusing on enhancing their understanding through personalized tutoring and one-on-one guidance.
My responsibilities included assisting professors during lab sessions by answering student inquiries and offering individualized support.
Additionally, I led after-school study groups, helping students solidify their grasp of course materials in a collaborative setting.

Subjects I have tutored include, but are not limited to:

CSD1121: High-level Programming
CSD1171: High-level Programming 2
CSD1130: Game Implementation Techniques

title: Software Engineer Intern
desc:
Interned as a Software Engineer at MQ Spectrum Pte Ltd, where I initially joined as a unit tester. Through initiative and determination, I successfully advocated to be more involved in the software development process.
I was eventually entrusted with leading the development of a new project from the ground up, while also contributing to other ongoing projects by resolving bugs and implementing minor features.
